user.title: Cable Modem Monitor
user.description: Enter your cable modem's IP address and credentials. The IP is typically 192.168.100.1 for Motorola modems. Leave username/password blank if your modem doesn't require authentication.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the modem. Please verify: 1) IP address is correct (typically 192.168.100.1), 2) If modem requires authentication, username/password are correct (leave blank if no auth needed), 3) Modem's web interface is accessible from Home Assistant's network. If connection works but setup still fails, your modem model may not be supported yet - please enable debug logging to help us add support.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Check Home Assistant logs for details.

connection_settings.title: Connection Settings
connection_settings.description: Configure modem connection and polling settings.

entity_naming.title: Entity Naming
entity_naming.description: Configure how entity names are formatted. This helps when you have multiple modems or want consistent naming.

data_description.entity_prefix:
Choose how entity names should be prefixed:
• Default: No prefix (e.g., 'Modem Connection Status')
• Domain: Add 'Cable Modem' prefix (e.g., 'Cable Modem Modem Connection Status')
• IP Address: Use IP as prefix (e.g., '192_168_100_1 Modem Connection Status')
• Custom: Define your own prefix
data_description.custom_prefix: Enter a custom prefix for entity names (only shown if Custom is selected above)
